content.title: Grammar
content.description:
Negative past perfect tense.
had not + past participle
Example: I had not slept well. They had not planned. You had not read this book. We had not finished our work.

content.title: Conversation
table: Parviz: You should take a break.
Afsun: I have to type to make money.
افسون: من باید تایپ کنم تا پول به دست آورم.
Parviz: But typing is causing you pain.
پرویز: اما تایپ باعث می‌شود درد بکشی.
Afsun: I should go to a doctor.

content.title: Common Phrases
table: You have wonderful taste in clothes.
شما سلیقه خوبی برای لباس دارید.

content.title: Reading
content.description:
Pasargadae is an ancient city in Iran. This city is located in the Fars province. Pasargadae was the capital of the Persian dynasty in the past.
This historical city has many places of interest.The tomb of Cyrus the great is located in this city. This city has a beautiful stone tower. The historical city Pasargadae is on UNESCOs list of world herritage sites.
